title: Jordan Peterson and Nasser at Liberty: 2 Movies Conversation on the Meaning Crisis/Cultural Liturgy
description:
The Convocation video was followed up with a "One More Question" video with JBP and David Nasser one on one. In some ways that conversation was even more interesting than the large event. I'll do a deep dive into that video but before that we need to look how in Scott Adam's metaphor we are watching two movies in one thing. We'll also bring in some James KA Smith on Cultural Liturgies as well as comments from Rod Dreher's blog. 

One Last Question https://youtu.be/afSQZweYDts
John Vervaeke Meaning Crisis Episode 11 https://youtu.be/39NpjQDtqNw
Episode 12 https://youtu.be/rvx4_0NAfaY
Rod Dreher's piece on Jordan Peterson and his MIssion at LIberty University https://www.theamericanconservative.com/dreher/jordan-peterson-liberty-university-mission/
Desiring the Kingdom https://www.amazon.com/Desiring-Kingdom-Worldview-Formation-Liturgies/dp/0801035775/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
